direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve transferring assets but perform different operations (withdrawal vs. universal transfer).
Both methods access and manipulate asset transfer history.
Both methods handle universal transfers but one performs the transfer and the other queries the transfer history.
Both methods involve operations that change the state of the user's wallet.
Both methods handle exceptions related to asset operations.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the initialization of the RequestHandler for API requests.
Environment setup is required before performing asset transfers.
Both methods verify the status of asset transfers and handle similar exceptions.
